price: Ó ṣeé ṣe kí A fi apá kan èyí tí A ṣe ní ìlérí fún wọn hàn ọ́ tàbí kí A ti gba ẹ̀mí rẹ (ṣíwájú àsìkò náà), ọ̀dọ̀ Wa kúkú ni ibùpadàsí wọn. Lẹ́yìn náà, Allāhu ni Arínú-róde ohun tí wọ́n ń ṣe níṣẹ́.
arabic: وَإِمَّا نُرِيَنَّكَ بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي نَعِدُهُمۡ أَوۡ نَتَوَفَّيَنَّكَ فَإِلَيۡنَا مَرۡجِعُهُمۡ ثُمَّ ٱللَّهُ شَهِيدٌ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-immā nuriyannaka baʿḍa alladhī naʿiduhum aw natawaffayannaka fa-ilaynā marjiʿuhum thumma al-lahu shahīdun ʿalā mā yafʿalūna
